text: Ani hamile tyasa vivadako sahi nirnaya sulaimanala'i samjha'idiyaum. Ra hamile duvaila'i nirnayasakti ra jnana pradana gareka thiyaum ra hamile pahadaharula'i ra caraharula'i pani da'udako adhinama garidi'eka thiyaum jasale ki unisamgai allahako stuti gardathe ra yasto garnevala hami nai thiyaum
